title: Real-World Problem-Based Learning Design for Open Data Competency Development

context.prior_knowledge: Basic data analysis and comprehension of science curriculum
context.additional_context: Science curriculum-linked program conducted in a smartphone-based limited-technology environment

learning_goals: Learners can explore and evaluate relevant open data to address local environmental issues.
Learners can analyze and interpret open data to solve real-world problems and connect them to local contexts.
Learners can construct data-driven narratives for the general public by utilizing diverse data sources.
Learners can generate open data representations using data visualization tools (e.g., smartphone apps).

constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
